title: Meditation: Instant energy boost
author: Ally Bogard
description: Energize yourself for the day ahead using only your breath in this quick meditation.
cleaned_text: Sign up to unlock your full potential All your tools in one place Expert-training to fuel your fitness, nutrition and mindfulness.
